ValidationRule.description: need referral contact name when Referral - External - Bank, CPA, AICPA/CPA2Biz, Non-AICPA, or Finl Advr Lead Source is used
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(AND(ISNEW(),OppSource__c="ReferralMethods")) ,OR(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Bank Referral"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-CPA"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-CPA-AICPA"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-CPA-Non-AICPA"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Insurance Broker"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Financial Advisor-Comm Based"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Financial Advisor-Fee Based"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-PEO Trusted Advisor"), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Referral-Financial Advisor")), Referral_Contact__c = "", OR(CONTAINS($User.Job_Name__c , "Sales Rep"),CONTAINS($User.Job_Name__c , "District Sales Manager"),CONTAINS($User.Job_Name__c ,"District Sales Assistant")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** You Must Enter The Referral Contact Name *** Remember to click the Magnifying Glass icon to complete the selection
